viewData.name: LG C7C 55" Class HDR 4K UHD Smart OLED TV
viewData.short_description: Buy LG C7C 55" Class HDR 4K UHD Smart OLED TV featuring UHD 3840 x 2160 OLED Panel, HDR10, Dolby Vision, HLG HDR Compatible Screen Mirroring Technology. Review LG C7
viewData.long_description: View content at four times the resolution of 1080p with the LG C7C 55" Class HDR 4K UHD Smart OLED TV. It will upscale lower-resolution video sources to near-4K quality for improved clarity. This TV has a 54.6" OLED display for enhanced black levels and virtually infinite contrast. Being HDR10-, Dolby Vision-, and HLG-compatible, it can display a wider range of color with compatible content than non-HDR TVs.The C7C has built-in Wi-Fi and Ethernet connectivity to allow access to your favorite apps and Internet-based content via the LG Content Store and the integrated web browser. You can use your tablet or smartphone for media sharing and screen mirroring on the C7C. With four HDMI inputs, there are multiple options for connecting high-definition video sources. It also features a component and composite RCA input analog sources. Three USB ports are onboard for connecting multimedia peripherals like flash drives.
